thread.title: Ghana FA confirms Ordinary Congress set for 9-10 November
thread.title_full: Ghana FA confirms Ordinary Congress set for 9-10 November

title: Ghana FA confirms Ordinary Congress set for 9-10 November
text:
Sports News | 20 October 2015 12:10 CET Ghana FA confirms Ordinary Congress set for 9-10 November - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ghana FA Executive Committee 
The Ghana Football Association has confirmed its Ordinary Congress will be held on 9-10 November at the Ghanaman Soccer Centre of Excellence in Prampram. 
123 delegates are to expected to convene at the venue to review the activity report for the just ended football season and usher in the new season. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
